about.introduction:
After 2 years of working in Biotechnology field, I realized this is not my passion and I decided to start over again in Software Development industry.

Intrigued by curiosity and creativity in building interesting applications, I know that I chose the right path.

Seeking to work in an environment that will help me improve my knowledge and develop my skills in Web Development Process, while allowing me to contribute to the continued growth and success of your organization.

Contact me via ðŸ“§ linhtran.atwork@gmail.com | View my CV

projects.title: Belle E-commerce
projects.summary: This is an fullstack e-commerce web app with basic features
projects.description:
Features

  • Login, Register and Login with Google and Facebook
  • User's profile: update avatar, username allow others search your profile and your story
  • Search users by name and username in search tool
  • Texting feature: allow user send text, emoji and picture
  • Enable user reply a specific message
  • For group-chat feature: ability to add more members and remove if you're an host. Leave group if you're an member

Technologies

  Backend
  • MongoDatabase
  • NodeJS
  • Socket.IO
  • Cloudinary for storing images
  Frontend
  • ReactJS and Redux
  • Socket-Client.IO
  • Material UI

References

technical.title: Technical Skills
technical.details:
• HTML, CSS, JS
  • ReactJS, NodeJS and Typescript
  • Unit test with Jest
  • Basic knowledge with MySQL, MongoDB, Postgre
  • Familiar with C# (ASP.NET)
  • Basic knowledge with Agile and Scrum Method
  • AWS services: EC2, S3, Elastics
  • Basic knowledge with Docker, Kubernets
  • Can apply CI/CD with Jenkin and GitLab
